proposal: Diving into the absurdly thrilling world of "The Comics," where the stakes are as high as the rewards, we see you're not just creating stories but adventures in the web3 universe. Congrats on rallying 83 holders in the ETH network! 🚀 Imagine enhancing this journey with your own DEX or engaging the community further with a blockchain-based lottery. Let's make the web3 life not just about living but thriving. Ready to add another chapter?
